name: DEVIL GUNS - DEMON BULLET HELL ARENA
name_original: DEVIL GUNS - DEMON BULLET HELL ARENA
description:
ITS TIME TO KILL SOME DEMONS! TRAPPED IN AN ABYSMAL, INSANE CARTOON WORLD YOU HAVE TO SURVIVE AMONGST UNCOUNTABLE HORDES OF DEMONS.
- survive as long as you can in this horde mode based first person survival arena shooter

- each arena has a different phase and random happenings on the map

- in each area, you have to search over 12 unique and crazy guns to increase your chance for survival

- each arena has differently themed demons to kill, some are spooky, psycho and sometimes even cute, but don't get fooled!

- you can unlock even more arenas, when you reach the high scores

- find hidden secrets in all arenas to unlock the biggest mystery in the game


AND GET READY FOR HALLOWEEN, BECAUSE THEN IT'S GOING REALLY NUTS BOY!

BLAST THEM ALL,

BUT DONT GET SCARED!
